text: [Music]
my first reaction when I heard about the
situation in Haiti I I think I was a
complete shock I was scared I guess and
I wanted to help I'm sure there's a lot
of kids that are out there that are
upset and I think that's okay but what
you should do is take those feelings and
use it as an opportunity to motivate
yourself to get involved and try to make
a difference I feel like this is an
opportunity for everyone to come
together I've seen so many kids help so
many fans from the show are helping and
it's just it's really wonderful to see
everyone can do something and everything
counts every little action causes a
chain reaction all of us doing our
little pieces together can make a
significant impact doesn't matter where
you're from what language you speak
we're all people and we all have the
same feelings and we all go through the
same things this is bringing the whole
world together I would say to try to
find the light in that and do as much as
you possibly can join the world as we
shine a light on Haiti
